title: Deranking for a no border
body:
Hey guys hope everyone's having a swell morning.

Is it possible for me to drop my rank from silver to bronze without constantly losing games? (don't wanna ruin it for my homies)
I've looked into it and the only option seems to be either losing a ton of games or transferring to a different server and not playing that 1 promotional game

Can anyone confirm if the second option works at all? Transferring servers and just not playing, that should leave me unranked right?

Thanks in advance
